page.title: 06FAST FOODS
page.content: FAST FOOD IS ANOTHER WAY OF GETTING READY COOKED FOOD QUICKLY.FAST FOOD SHOPS ARE SIMILAR TO THE FISH AND CHIP SHOPS THAT WERE COMMON EARLIER IN THE CENTURY AND STILL EXIST WHEN FISH AND CHIPS WERE COOKED IN LARGE VATS OF OIL.TODAY THEY SELL MEAT PIES,PORTIONS OF CHICKEN AND SAUSSAGES AS WELL AS FISH.IN THESE SHOPS YOU GENERALLY HAVE TO WAIT WHILE THE FOOD IS COOKED FOR YOU.A FAST FOOD SHOP WORKS MORE LIKE A FACTORY.IT PRODUCES LARGE QUANTITIES OF CHIPS, BEEFBURGERS OR SIMILAR TYPES OF MEAT WHICH ARE SERVED TO YOU VERY QUICKLY.YOU CAN EAT THEM IN THE SHOP OR YOU CAN TAKE THEM AWAY. IN THE SHOP, THE SEATING IS VERY CLINICAL SO THAT IT IS USUALLY VERY CLEAN. THE PLATES ARE MADE OF PAPER SO THAT EVERYTHING IS THROWN AWAY. THERE IS NO WASHING UP TO DO.THEY ARE CHEAP.
